traffic_mimicry.name: Traffic Mimicry
traffic_mimicry.description:
Traffic Mimicry Attack that disguises bypass attempts as legitimate application traffic.

    This attack analyzes the target domain and selects an appropriate traffic profile
    to mimic, then generates packet sequences that match the behavioral patterns
    of popular applications.

dpi_response_adaptive.name: Dpi Response Adaptive
dpi_response_adaptive.description: DPI Response Adaptive Attack - adapts based on simulated DPI responses.

network_condition_adaptive.name: Network Condition Adaptive
network_condition_adaptive.description: Network Condition Adaptive Attack - adapts based on simulated network conditions.

learning_adaptive.name: Learning Adaptive
learning_adaptive.description:
Learning Adaptive Attack - learns from previous attempts and adapts.
    Now uses persistent learning memory with SQLite storage.

baseline.name: Baseline
baseline.description:
A special attack that applies no modifications. It sends the payload as-is
    to measure the baseline connectivity and latency without any bypass techniques.

dynamic_combo.name: Dynamic Combo
dynamic_combo.description:
Dynamic Combo Attack - выполняет последовательность атак.

    Эта атака является заглушкой для совместимости с существующим кодом.
    В реальной реализации она должна выполнять последовательность других атак.

full_session_simulation.name: Full Session Simulation
full_session_simulation.description:
Full Session Simulation Attack that creates a complete realistic user session
    from DNS resolution through application data to session teardown.

multi_flow_correlation.name: Multi Flow Correlation
multi_flow_correlation.description:
Multi-Flow Correlation Attack that creates background legitimate traffic
    to mask the main bypass attempt and confuse DPI correlation analysis.

tcp_http_combo.name: Tcp Http Combo
tcp_http_combo.description: TCP + HTTP Combo Attack - combines TCP segmentation with HTTP obfuscation.

tls_fragmentation_combo.name: Tls Fragmentation Combo
tls_fragmentation_combo.description: TLS + Fragmentation Combo Attack - combines TLS manipulation with IP fragmentation.

payload_tunneling_combo.name: Payload Tunneling Combo
payload_tunneling_combo.description: Payload + Tunneling Combo Attack - combines payload obfuscation with protocol tunneling.

adaptive_multi_layer.name: Adaptive Multi Layer
adaptive_multi_layer.description: Adaptive Multi-Layer Attack - dynamically combines multiple techniques.

image_steganography.name: Image Steganography
image_steganography.description: Image Steganography Attack - hides data in fake image headers.

tcp_timestamp_steganography.name: Tcp Timestamp Steganography
tcp_timestamp_steganography.description: TCP Timestamp Steganography Attack - hides data in TCP timestamp options.

ip_id_steganography.name: Ip Id Steganography
ip_id_steganography.description: IP ID Steganography Attack - hides data in IP identification fields.

combined_field_steganography.name: Combined Field Steganography
combined_field_steganography.description: Combined Field Steganography Attack - uses multiple protocol fields simultaneously.

network_protocol_steganography.name: Network Protocol Steganography
network_protocol_steganography.description: Network Protocol Steganography Attack - hides data in protocol fields.

timing_channel_steganography.name: Timing Channel Steganography
timing_channel_steganography.description: Timing Channel Steganography Attack - uses timing patterns to encode data.

covert_channel_combo.name: Covert Channel Combo
covert_channel_combo.description: Covert Channel Combo Attack - combines multiple covert channel techniques.

advanced_image_steganography.name: Advanced Image Steganography
advanced_image_steganography.description: Advanced Image Steganography with real LSB pixel manipulation.

advanced_protocol_field_steganography.name: Advanced Protocol Field Steganography
advanced_protocol_field_steganography.description: Advanced Protocol Field Steganography with real field manipulation.

advanced_timing_channel_steganography.name: Advanced Timing Channel Steganography
advanced_timing_channel_steganography.description: Advanced Timing Channel Steganography with precise timing control.

pipeline_manipulation.description: Send multiple HTTP requests in a pipeline to confuse DPI

header_splitting.description: Split HTTP headers across multiple TCP segments

dns_dot_tunneling.description: Bypass DNS filtering using DNS over TLS (DoT) tunneling
